title: Ceramic Abstracts
aka: Journal of the American Ceramic Society: Ceramic Abstracts
additional-note: This was issued as an independent publication beginning in 1922, but by the mid-1940s had become a section of the Journal of the American Ceramic Society.  The first renewal associated with this publication, and most of the later ones, give both titles. (Ceramic Abstracts would become a separate publication again in the 1970s.)

see-also.note: Journal of the American Ceramic Society
